yage.system.render

Authors:
Eric Poggel

License:
LGPL

class Render;
As the nodes of the scene graph are traversed, those to be rendered in the current frame are added to a queue. They are then reordered for correct and optimal rendering. Translucent polygons are separated, sorted and rendered in a second pass.

static void add(Node node);
Add a node to the queue for rendering.

static void all(ref uint poly_count, ref uint vertex_count);
Render everything in the queue

static CameraNode getCurrentCamera();
Get the current (or last) camera that is/was rendering a scene.

static void setCurrentCamera(CameraNode camera);
Set the current camera for rendering.
